name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: targets, front, 20
else
  perform start
end
wait for movement
face user: target
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

note:

shake screen: 3, 9, 5
action effect
death break
</target Action>

name: Energy Core
note:
<cooldown: 5>
<setup action>
display action
wait: 5
hide battle hud
</setup action>

<Target Action>
motion spell: user
wait: 45
se: Monster4
action animation: target
wait: 10
action effect: target
wait: 10
action effect: target
wait: 10
action effect: target
wait: 9
action effect: target
wait: 8
action effect: target
wait: 7
action effect: target
death break
clear battle log
wait: 20
perform finish
</Target Action>

<follow action>
show battle hud
</follow action>
